storyInfo: Shining and Margaret repel the Confessarius at the cost of shattering Nightingale's soul, and his servant Qalid'čoa carries him to safety. At the same time, Salus uses her own blood to boil the Blood of Teekaz.

attributes.content: Here you are.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: ...Nearl.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: You don't return to the landship often. Stay with Liz a bit; she's missed you.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: She just fell asleep.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: While you seem more exhausted than when I last saw you.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Are you worried about Liz? I asked Dr. Kal'tsit, and she said Liz's condition is still under control—
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Is there... something you haven't told me?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I'm thinking... of a way to 'cure' Liz for good.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: You've poured years into this, it just won't come quickly, so don't torture yourself over it.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: What if... I told you a solution has always existed, only I've dared not try it?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Shining.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: What exactly are you hiding from me? What is it you can't say?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Nearl, this is a duty I must see through on my own.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Do you think Liz and I will leave you?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: You know that won't happen.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: My concern... has always been that you two might get hurt.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I've decided to join Liz in searching for her memories. I shall accompany her... until we find the truth. However...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Nearl—
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: A time will come when I need you to protect Liz in my stead.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But I will protect and fight... for more than just Liz.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Shining, I will stand for you as well.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: We have always stood by each other. The Followers are as one.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: My oath remains, unchanged—
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Margaret Nearl and her swordstaff will be there for you, whenever needed.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The swordstaff sweeps wide.
A dazzling radiance repels a crowd of foes.
Every single Confessarius here... is a powerful foe.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: So that's why you weren't willing to spar with me, Shining.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: We saved quite a lot of money for Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Our greatest foe... lies ahead.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Let's settle this quickly.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: What a farce!
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Careful!
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: *huff*—Hah.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I can take it.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Shining, my shield will protect you.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: You need only... advance.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: A torrent of witchcraft washes toward them.
Margaret's radiance is suppressed.
Qui'sartuštaj stands on the top of the steps, day and night surging within his palm.
So this is the help you found? Qui'saršinnag, what do you think our ceremonial altar is?
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: A... meadow? For a Kuranta to frolic in?
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Hmph, so her Arts can momentarily block my influence on you.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: And what of it? Your swordplay and Arts all come from me.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: You can't even harm me... unless I let you.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*—Ugh!
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Everything's slowed down...?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: His Arts... affect the perception of time? Or is it something else...?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Shining!
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: ...I'm alright.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Your shield...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: ...The first crack on this new shield of mine.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But no matter, I can mend it with my Arts.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: A knight's shield will never weaken when protecting someone in need.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: What a detestable light.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Puny foal, I've killed so many pegasi like you... I've stopped counting.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: I smeared their golden blood on the walls of my Kazdel—so that my city would look as if forever bathed in the radiance of dawn.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: And their descendants would understand Kazdel is not a domain they can invade as they please.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: We're not in Kazdel.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: And you're not some homeland hero either.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Heroes shed their own blood to clear the way for others.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But you—All I see is your path to ascension drenched with the blood, tears and bones of others.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Heroes? I decided long ago to give up being one.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: The hero people sing and praise... but is as fleeting as sand. No matter how I try to master the time I have, it does not stop for me.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: I will die, and the city I built will collapse. My beloved people will only be compelled to continue wandering.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: This hopeless cycle... torments every single Sarkaz, including me.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: As a sovereign, I have the responsibility and power, and ought to change my people's fate at the source.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: As long as the Sarkaz need no longer lie prostrate before beasts like you, as long as my Kazdel stands everlasting through days and nights—
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: All the light around them rushes toward Qui'sartuštaj's palm as he speaks.
Margaret's Arts, the Arts of the other Confessarii, and even... the little sunlight straining through the dense clouds.
In his palm floats a small crown of thorns, as impenetrable as the darkest night.
Nightingale floats up from the stone bed.
Her eyes are still shut, her limbs lack strength, but her arms involuntarily open—
When the last light has been caged, the crown will fall on Qui'sartuštaj's head.
Liz...!
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Shining, follow my light! Save her—
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: A sharp spear of light tears a path through the witchcraft barrier.
Shining arrives before Qui'sartuštaj.
Night descends like a cage, and the only light comes from her blade.
The soul glimmers on the tip of her sword.
...Liz.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I return the true memories I once took from you.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.text: No fields, no woods, no streams... and no flower wreaths.
Only a girl huddled in a dark corner.
The entire room serves as her cage, and she cannot tell day from night.
Because she is merely a manufactured, empty shell.
With no consciousness, or knowledge of pain or fear. she reacts to no Arts inflicted on her at all.

attributes.content: In my obsession with exploring the soul... I left some... unnecessary vestiges in you when carving yours.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: You're... awake.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: You're starting to have emotions, and responding to them.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: The experiment will continue, I have to...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.text: Create some illusions. Fill up that newborn soul with memories fabricated by Arts.
To cover up the truest, scariest ones.

attributes.content: I think you should feel a little better, at least.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: You will feel truly alive, as if you've experienced... a bit of warmth.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.text: As long as I lost myself in those wholly trusting eyes, I didn't have to confront the cruelty of what I'd done to her.

attributes.content: I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: You should have remembered... Liz.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: You must remember all that we promised each other.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: A blue fowlbeast emerges from the darkness.
Gigantic grey-white eyes stare at Shining, and a tear slowly falls.
The girl in the air floats down.
Shining and Margaret hear Nightingale's voice simultaneously in the frozen time.
I remember, Shining.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: You took me out of the darkest of rooms and we escaped... you accompanied me everywhere in search of medical help...
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: And then we met Nearl, and two became three.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: We went many places, and saved many people.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: You often sighed with knitted brows in the middle of the night... but once I opened my eyes, you shifted to the warmest tone I know and told me about the beautiful things I missed on our journey.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Nearl tried to teach me how to dance a few times. She'd hold me and spin... until I couldn't move anymore, and the two of you would help me, taking turns carrying me...
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: When I'm at your side...
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: It's as if... I really can fly.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: The two of you have made me what I am now.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: I am a member of the Followers... and a healer.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: I'll protect you both too.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: And fight alongside as well, to sever the gravest sins, to save... those shrouded in the eternal night.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: This is what the three of us...
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: ...Promised each other.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Nightingale lands on the ground.
Her staff and body emit an intense light.
A giant cage appears, and catches Qui'sartuštaj's body within.
Ugh—!
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: The soul was completely under my control, why is this cage—
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: I have a name.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: I am Liz—and I am your enemy.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Qui'sartuštaj, I'm stopping you because... I don't agree with a single word you've said.
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Shining, Nearl...
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Shining grips her sword tight.
Margaret tosses her swordstaff, and it hits right on target, the crown of thorns revolving in Qui'sartuštaj's hand.
The trio are in complete sync with their thoughts and actions.
Grab the flickering sliver of the soul, before day and night take control once more.
A long path of blood is the only crack before her eyes.
I've found it, the essence of your soul.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Qui'saršinnag... you...
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: What this body will become... I am unconcerned.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: If blood does control my will, then Liz and Nearl will pass judgement on me, in my stead as I am now.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: But I will not be your puppet.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I will not conquer or rule in your name.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Until death... I will be free.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Free? You speak of freedom?
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Shall we give it a go?
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Qui'saršinnag, we are not easily parted.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Try again... to leave my side. Try and see... how long you can run from me.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: I will run no longer.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Rather, I will—grant you an eternal death.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Shining—Retreat!
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The moonlight above the tree tumbles down the cliff, and the ground violently rumbles as if about to turn upside down.
The altar crumbles, and thick golden Originium liquid gushes out from the cracks.
A figure appears without anyone noticing. He does not move fast, but manages to appear just in time to block Qui'sartuštaj from the Followers.
We should leave....
attributes.name: Qalid'čoa

attributes.content: ...Your Highness.
attributes.name: Qalid'čoa

attributes.content: Heh... So it's you.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Who's there—?!
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Followers... is it?
attributes.name: Qalid'čoa

attributes.content: In this era where valor is scarce, your radiance bedazzles.
attributes.name: Qalid'čoa

attributes.content: We shall meet again.
attributes.name: Qalid'čoa

attributes.content: Qalid'čoa and Qui'sartuštaj's figures blend into the remains of the altar.
The other Confessarii follow suit.
The crown of thorns shot out of Qui'sartuštaj's hand earlier suddenly spins, and turns into a pitch-black shadow that flies up toward the sky.
...The Shard.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: In the eye of the storm... is that the 'Amnannam' mentioned over the comms?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit, the Doctor, and the others... will they make it?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Shining, you... uh, anything feel off?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I'm alright.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: This blood curse is indeed complicated.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Wait, Liz... Liz?!
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Liz...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Your soul... why is it incomplete?!
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Did you fracture your soul... when you resisted Qui'sartuštaj?!
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Shining... Nearl...
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: I'm here.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I've always been here, Liz.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: I'm alright...
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: You two have protected me for so long... so it's my turn...
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: I want... the three of us... to be always...
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Liz!
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Come, Shining! We'll treat her together!
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Shining?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: It's futile.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Our Arts can't heal such a grievous wound on her soul in this environment.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Liz is unique, both her body and soul. Her birth was coincidental... no, I would rather call it a miracle.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Then we...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Will first leave this place, and then plan our next move.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: What about Qui'sartuštaj? Do we just let him go?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: His fate means nothing compared to Liz's safety—he means nothing now.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Let us return.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Yes, together.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: ...Leader.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: (Furious roaring)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Qui'sartuštaj failed to cage the Black Crown.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The altar's power has weakened... I can work through its influence now—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The altar's upper layer is breaking apart. Amiya, focus your attacks on the Blood of Teekaz.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hmm... Yes.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The King of Sarkaz has already sentenced me to death.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: But this is nothing new to me.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: You're clearly... in pain.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You revere Qui'sartuštaj, but he left you behind like nothing. He treats you just like how you treat those Chimeras... exactly the same.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't waste your breath, King of Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: My feelings are nothing special.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: The Confessarii are of the Leader's blood. Though some are born more perfect than others... like Qui'saršinnag. Still others like myself were never in the running to be chosen at all.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: But I've never envied her.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: We only stand in the spot befitting us best.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: We were supposed to be inseparable. We are all limbs... of the same one body.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: There is no other group able to perform unprecedented miracles like we Confessarii can.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: I am curious.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Is there nothing you're strongly attached to?
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Doctor... Would you not make the same choice as I have, for your life's work, for those dear to you, and the ones who have fought by your side this whole time?
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Whether it be under some control or influence... it does not matter.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: To reach our origin, and create a completely new future.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: That's all I want.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: I can't... let you get close to the Blood of Teekaz.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hah... Oh.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: A black line pierces through Salus's body once again and strikes the altar's core at the same time.
The Blood of Teekaz stills.
I'm so close... ngh.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Amiya, stop her!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She's going to ignite—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's fine, it's fine...
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: My body... is just like a monster's...
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: She stretches out her broken hand towards that drop of blood.
A curse known only to the Confessarii, inflicted upon the soul, upon all blood and flesh—
It will probably be a complete death this time.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Before the Leader, before Qui'saršinnag, and before all my family...
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: I'll take the first step... into the future I yearn for.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Salus smiles and throws herself onto the still heart.
The Blood of Teekaz boils.
A giant crimson vortex appears from the altar's core—
In that moment, Amiya feels as if she's being watched.
By Qui'sartuštaj, by the crowned without names, by the howling myriad souls... and the one she is most familiar with.
Theresa...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amnannam.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Salus used her own blood to complete the Confessarius ceremony.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Quick, get away from the altar!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit
